events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review it shortly and get back to you with the next steps.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills outlined in the resume.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage your application and guide you through the recruitment process for the engineering role.
Our initial screening interview went well, and we discussed your background, technical skills, and motivation for joining our software engineering team.
Thank you for your prompt reply and enthusiasm following the screening. We appreciate your detailed answers and look forward to the next steps.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next Monday at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare to discuss coding challenges, system design, and debugging exercises.
